Unknown.translation: By the use of which collyrium in the eyes can one see the beloved Lord? What ear-rings can help hear his sound?

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: auh mwlk ikhVy surmy kr ky A`Kwˆ nwˆl dyKIdw hY, ikhVy vwilAwˆ kr ky kMnwˆ nwl aus dy bcnwˆ nUM suxIdw hY[

lines.gurmukhi: kvn qMmol kir rsnw sujsu rsY; kOn kir kMkn nmskwr kIjIAY [

Unknown.translation: Which betel leaf when chewed can help the tongue repeat the supreme praise of the beloved Lord? What bangles should be worn in the hands to greet and salute Him?

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ikhVy pwn dy Kwx kr ky rsnw aus dy sohxy js ivc rsdI hY? ikhVy kMgx h`QIˆ pw ky aus nUM nmskwr krIdI hY[

lines.gurmukhi: kvn kusm hwr kir aur DwrIAq; kOn AMgIAw su kir AMkmwl dIjIAY [

Unknown.translation: What flower garland can make Him reside in the heart? What bodice should be worn to embrace Him with hands?

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ikhVy Pu`lwˆ dy hwrwˆ duAwrw aus nUM ihrdy AMdr vsweIdw hY, ikhVI AMgIAw pw ky h`Qwˆ nwl aus nUM j`PI pweIdI hY[

lines.gurmukhi: kaun hIr cIr lptwie kY lpyt lIjY; kvn sMjog ipRXw pRym rsu pIjIAY [626[

Unknown.translation: What dress and diamond can be worn to entice Him? With what method can the union of the beloved be relished? The crux of the whole thing is that all embellishments are worthless. Relishing His love can only unite one with Him.  (626)

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ikhVy hIry qy bsqR pihnky aus nUM lpyt leIdw hY, qy ikhVy sMjog kr ky ipAwry dw pRym rs pIvIdw hY? ]626]
